#summary funiq - deduplicates adjacent rows of data having common field values

= Usage =

`funiq <options> [file ...]`



= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-V||--version|| ||print version info and exit||
||-v||--verbose|| ||print verbose messages during execution||
||-d||--delimiter||<delim> ||field separator (default: 0xfe)||
||-f||--fields||<fields> ||indexes of fields to consider in the deduplication||
||-F||--field-labels||<field_labels> ||labels of fields to consider in the deduplication||
||-c||--count|| ||produce a count of duplicated lines||
